item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (728 points | 191 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (273 points | 111 comments)
3. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (415 points | 399 comments)
4. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (31 points | 3 comments)
5. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (129 points | 41 comments)
6. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (95 points | 74 comments)
7. VVVVVV Source Code (94 points | 14 comments)
8. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (72 points | 33 comments)
9. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (316 points | 263 comments)
10. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (51 points | 24 comments)
11. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (81 points | 9 comments)
12. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (14 points | 3 comments)
13. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (103 points | 57 comments)
14. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (521 points | 483 comments)
15. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (186 points | 96 comments)
16. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (77 points | 18 comments)
17. Sutton and Barto book implementation (38 points | 9 comments)
18. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (219 points | 74 comments)
19. EPA Plans to Shut Down the Energy Star Program (86 points | 59 comments)
20. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (184 points | 139 comments)
21. Continue (YC S23) is hiring software engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
22. DuoBook: Generate bilingual stories to learn any language (7 points | 5 comments)
23. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (78 points | 32 comments)
24. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (84 points | 78 comments)
25. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (92 points | 42 comments)
26. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (152 points | 20 comments)
27. Creativity came to pass (27 points | 13 comments)
28. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (165 points | 100 comments)
29. iOS Kindle app now has a ‘get book’ button after changes to App Store rules (146 points | 144 comments)
30. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (40 points | 7 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
